text:
Yep! Erich had posted that one. I was just trying to emphasize that these
scripts that would have worked a couple years ago are very misleading now since
every PC will list Acrobat and not Reader. 
---- 
Steve Yates
ITS, Inc.

metadata.topic: Detecting whether PC has Acrobat or Reader
metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Detecting whether PC has Acrobat or Reader
metadata.email_text_original:
Yep!  Erich had posted that one. 😊  I was just trying to emphasize that these
scripts that would have worked a couple years ago are very misleading now since
every PC will list Acrobat and not Reader. 
---- 
Steve Yates
ITS, Inc. 
From: 'David Svirskis' via PatchManagement <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, November 29, 2023 4:30 PM
To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Detecting whether PC has Acrobat or Reader 
Steve, the original question has an official answer, published here -
https://helpx.adobe.com/acrobat/kb/about-acrobat-reader-dc-migration-to-64-bit.html
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhelpx.adobe.com%2Facrobat%2Fkb%2Fabout-acrobat-reader-dc-migration-to-64-bit.html&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C90cfce8ddd154bffafde08dbf1c1cce8%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638369586901890584%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=sH0CjWWddNeu0SE3UzQVFvYQTai98038jyzZFj9JazE%3D&reserved=0] 
In any case – not sure a new PS function is required for listing add/remove
programs, Get-Package is built in and provides heaps of details. 
Cheers, 
David
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/SN6PR08MB5517C463C23EF8A9010D6358B782A%40SN6PR08MB5517.namprd08.prod.outlook.com
